column4: anyone who uses the windows manager Oroboros? anyone to give me the source paths for adept to download OrobotOSX ?
anyone who uses the windows manager Oroboros? anyone to give me the source paths for adept to download OroborOSX ? sorry
that sounds like a mac os x question
: thats linux isnt it??? mac os x isnt linux?
well if you're trying to use oroborOSX (which is the mac os x port of oroborus) then it has nothing to do with ubuntu or linux.
: why??? i can find it source code in tar.gz
please listen.  oroborus is an X11 environment for MAC OS X, NOT LINUX
what do you mean "is in universe" ?
next time instead of asking about some mac os x crap you can at least apt-cache search for the package.
edgy (x11): A lightweight themeable windowmanager for X [universe]
and mac is not crap.it 's maybe one of the best computers out there
it's for amd64, i386, and powerpc
and i have a mac too, FYI
